DOC.brief_title: China PEACE 3 : Cardiovascular Health And Texting ( CHAT ) Study
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : This study aim evaluate effectiveness automate mobile phone text message-based intervention secondary prevention , include lifestyle modification , medication adherence improvement risk factor control among CHD patient without diabetes . We hypothesize intervention use mobile phone text base education reminder improve risk factor control medication adherence CHD patient . Study design : The study two-arm , parallel , randomize clinical trial . Patients eligible documented CHD define history myocardial infarction PCI without diabetes mellitus , capability read send short message , able provide inform consent . Patients active mobile phone exclude . The eligible participant allocate intervention control group 1:1 ratio randomly . The intervention group receive intervention pre-designed text message addition usual care , control group receive usual care . All participant follow 6 month . Study intervention : Participants intervention group receive semi-personalized text message 6 month well usual care . Non-smokers receive two general message , two hypertension message , one medication adherence message one physical activity message per week . Smokers receive one general message , two hypertension message , one medication adherence message , one physical activity message one smoking cessation message per week . Outcome measure : The primary endpoint systolic blood pressure control . Secondary endpoint include physical activity , medication adherence smoking cessation , low-density lipoprotein cholesterol ( LDL-C ) , body mass index ( BMI ) . Exploratory endpoint include long-term prognosis patient , death , non-fatal myocardial infarction , stroke , well health status ( SAQ EQ-5D ) . Statistical analysis : Evaluation carry intention-to-treat basis . Values analyze endpoint intervention group control group compare accord analysis plan . We 'll follow prespecified analysis plan subgroup analysis conduct accordingly .
